Questions.QuestionString: Propellers are subdivided into?
Answers: Adjustable pitch propellers and Variable pitch propellers.
Fixed pitch propellers, Adjustable pitch propellers and Variable pitch propellers.

Questions.QuestionString: What is Fixed Pitch Propeller?
Answers: The blade angle are used for up to about 200 kW (250 hp) performance and speeds of up to 250 km/h (160 mph). The blade angle (pitch) cannot be changed.

The blade angle of an adjustable pitch propeller can be changed on the ground
when the engine is shut down.
The blade angle can be changed during operation.

Questions.QuestionString: What is Variable Pitch Propeller?
Answers: The blade angle are used for up to about 200 kW (250 hp) performance and speeds of up to 250 km/h (160 mph). The blade angle (pitch) cannot be changed.

The blade angle of an adjustable pitch propeller can be changed on the ground
when the engine is shut down.
The blade angle can be changed during operation.
